Add variable to get slides if no ng-repeat is used

Merge pull request #421 from Djuless/patch-1

Fix nested carousels

Allow nested carousels

GetSlidesDOM was looking all the way down the DOM tree.
If a carousel had another carousel nested in, the GetSlidesDOM was returning an array containing all the slides from both the parent and the child carousel, causing the topmost slides to have a wrong translation.

Fix sliding bug when doing multitouch sliding.

Fix sliding bug when doing multitouch sliding.
The best way to reproduce it is to slide whith one finger, and in the middle of the slide (and without stop touching) add another finger and slide up
this way, the slides look mixed up.

Merge pull request #225 from samaxes/master

Prevent error when carousel is hidden by ngIf

Prevent error when carousel is hidden by ngIf

When the carousel is hidden by ngIf the selector
tElement[0].querySelector('li') returns null causing the following
error:

TypeError: Cannot read property 'attributes' of null
    at
Object.compile
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular-carousel/dist/angular-carousel.js:221:79)

at applyDirectivesToNode
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:6473:32)

at compileNodes
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:6043:15)

at compileNodes
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:6055:15)

at compile
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:5976:15)

at applyDirectivesToNode
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:6386:33)

at compileNodes
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:6043:15)

at compile
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular/angular.js:5976:15)

at link
(http://localhost:9000/bower_components/angular-route/angular-route.js:903:18)
<ul class="notifications" rn-carousel=""
rn-carousel-index="notificationIndex" rn-carousel-buffered="">

Merge pull request #223 from samaxes/master

Support inner <ul> elements inside slides

Support inner <ul> elements inside slides

AngularJS Touch Carousel should only animate and change CSS properties
on direct carousel <li> children. Otherwise slides cannot contain other
<ul> elements.

Merge pull request #136 from ActivKonnect/feature/fix_container_width

fix (carousel): carousel width was incorrectly rounded

fix (carousel): carousel width was incorrectly rounded

Rounding the carousel width caused display bugs in case where parent
containers did not have round widths, like a fluid column in a bootstrap
guide. The resulting width produced unexplained 1px margin, and a slight
shift from slide to slide.
Merge branch 'IE9Support' of github.com:intelligenia/angular-carousel into intelligenia-IE9Support

fix(carousel): prevent $digest already in progress

when in isolated scope, check $rootScope.$$phase

feat (directive): IE9 Support

IE9 support, so the carrousel will work on IE9.
Optional parameter rn-carousel-ie9support will enable this support.
If enabled, the directive will check if the browser is IE9
and, in this case, will use translate instead of translate3d.
For this to work, a RequestAnimationFrame polyfill is needed. You can
install any of your convenience, e.g. 'bower install raf.js'

Version tag: 0.2.0+IE9Support
chore(release): properly release v0.2.0 as a valid semver version
fix: prevent exception when bufering not nough slides

Merge pull request #116 from leeroybrun/master

fix(swipeEnd): prevent buttons inside slider to trigger swipeEnd

fix(swipeEnd): prevent buttons inside slider to trigger swipeEnd
Buttons inside slider (like prev/next buttons) can trigger the swipeEnd event on click (because of touchend/mouseup from $swipe).
This cause the slider to stand on some browsers, even if the index is updated.
Closes #115

Merge pull request #34 from brandid/minified-fix

fix(carousel-infinite): breaks on minification, needed [array] notation
fix(carousel): prevent blurry effect on galaxy S3 and more
fix(carousel): orientation change reset the width first

fix(carousel): revert 0cc71273359d1ab61794885503ef78928bc9c011

- the track by $index was causing flickering for some reason
fix(carousel): always reset swipe status on touchend
fix(carousel): allow duplicates items in the ngRepeat

feat(carousel): add rn-carousel-infinite directive

 - the rn-carousel-infinite directive allows any structure to be converted as a carousel without ul/li
 - the slides are gathered using the prev/next callbacks that should return a promise resolving the prev/next context

feat(watch): allow deep watch of the original collection

 - the rn-carousel-watch allows watching deeply the ngRepeat expression if needed see #25
fix(carousel): prevent duplicates on prev/next callbacks
fix(carousel): prevent animation when no touchmove
fix(carousel): prevent animation on prev/next promises
chore(grunt): add angular-mobile to dist folder
feat(carousel): implement prev/next callbacks for infinite carousels
chore: split files, fixes tests, add watch task
fix(carousel): handle various attribute syntax, fix #21
feat(buferring): handle deffered and promises and regular callbacks

feat(buffering): enable infinite buffered carousel

 - added rn-carousel-prev|next directive that accept a callback
 - the callback can return one or more items to be prepended or appended to the collection
 - the callback can also return a promise which will resolve with one or more items
 - simplified the buffering process
 - cleanup
 - fix demos
Update on modal style and various improvment
chore(demo): hide modal on change collection
fix(carousel): reset position when collection changes
fix(demo): reset carousel position on data load
fix(carousel): fix negative index and buffered carousel
feat(demo): flickr demo update with snap.js
fix(css): use position:relative for the container

fix(css): fix flickering

 - prevent flickering by hiding backface

fix(rn-carousel): fix CSS positioning

 - use position relative for the container and absolute left offset instead of padding-left. works better when container is set in %.
 - added a full screen Flickr browser demo

feat(rn-carousel): add activeIndex property+demo

 - add scope.activeIndex useful to compare with $index in the templates
 - add Flickr demo
 - add some tests
test(rn-carousel): add swipe tests using browserTrigger.js

refactor(rn-carousel): use ngMobile module

Replaced swipe logic with  in forthcoming ngMobile module.

feat(rn-carousel): prevent out of bounds index

prevent negative or out of bounds indexes
add tests

feat(rn-carousel): add on end callback

Add rn-carousel-on-end callback so you can add slides dynamically
Add infinite carousel demos

feat(buffering): allow buffering the slides

add a rn-carousel-buffered option to allow minimize the DOM with large datasets
the slides are updated after each animationEnd
the default buffer size is 3 slides, but this should be tweakeable later
docs(readme): add link to making of article

refactor(rn-carousel): various improvements

Added features :
 - add rn-carousel-indicator option (fix #8)
 - add rn-carousel-index two way data binding to control and get the carousel index
 - added many e2e tests
 - removes the announcer/subscriber pattern and use instead a ngRepeat expression parser and watch the collection directly

BREAKING CHANGES: the carousel has been renamed to rn-carousel to prevent angularui bootstrap carousel collision (fix #3)

Merge pull request #4 from PascalPrecht/bower-integration

Bower integration
Removed test/lib folder; Added component.json; Updated .gitignore; Updated karma.conf.js; new build;

fix(chore): endSwipe on every mouseup

endSwipe movement even when mouse released outside the carousel container

feat(carousel): prevent short swipes

cancel swipe if delta < carousel.width * 0.1
fix(demo): use non min version for demo
